# detail

**Instance Property**

A user-readable description of the shipping method.

## Declaration

```swift
var detail: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to differentiate the shipping methods you offer. For example “Ships in 24 hours.” or “Arrives by 5pm on July 29.”

Don’t repeat the content of the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentSummaryItem/label] property inherited from [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentSummaryItem].



## Working with shipping methods

- **dateComponentsRange**: An expected range of delivery or shipping dates for a package, or the time range when an item is available for pickup.
- **identifier**: A unique identifier for the shipping method, used by the app.
- **PKDateComponentsRange**: An object that specifies the start and end dates for a range of time.
